summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 27th Avenue Southwest from West Kenyon Street to West Thistle Street; and certain other streets; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17941 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
